actions.committee: House Committee on Banking and Currency
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking and Currency.

official_title: A bill to provide that certain expenses incurred in the construction of a rapid transit station in Oakland, Calif., shall be eligible as local grants-in-aid for purposes of title I of the Housing Act of 1949.

summary.text: Provides that expenses incurred in the construction of the Twelfth Street Bay Area Rapid Transit Station Oakland, California, shall be eligible as local grants-in-aid for purposes of title I of the Housing Act of 1949.

titles.title: A bill to provide that certain expenses incurred in the construction of a rapid transit station in Oakland, Calif., shall be eligible as local grants-in-aid for purposes of title I of the Housing Act of 1949.
